name: microservice-example
description: Microservice Architecture Example - Demonstrates service mesh patterns with Moro

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:user" "npm run dev:payment" "npm run dev:order"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd user-service && npm install && cd ../payment-service && npm install && cd ../order-service && npm install
scripts.build:all: cd user-service && npm run build && cd ../payment-service && npm run build && cd ../order-service && npm run build
scripts.start:all: concurrently "cd user-service && npm start" "cd payment-service && npm start" "cd order-service && npm start"
scripts.clean:all: cd user-service && npm run clean && cd ../payment-service && npm run clean && cd ../order-service && npm run clean

author: Moro
